name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A rich and creamy chicken tikka masala with aromatic spices
recipeInstructions: Heat oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook for 5-6 minutes until golden.
Add the onions [2] [3] and cook for 3-4 minutes until softened.
Stir in garlic, ginger, and spices. Cook for 1 minute.
Add tomato paste and cook for another 2 minutes.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 15 [20] [25] minutes until sauce thickens.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice.
